home.title: Aspiring Developer by Passion
home.description: {name} {lastName} is an aspiring developer turning ideas into elegant, high-performance websites, bots and other digital solutions.

projects.description: Discover my web and software development projects. Portfolio of projects including websites, applications and innovative digital solutions.

home.pageDescription:
Transforming ideas into websites, bots, and
other elegant, high-performance digital solutions

letter.second:
Every project is unique, and so is every company or training center.
This is why a personalized cover letter cannot be provided as a general rule.
letter.third:
I would be delighted to provide you with a letter that specifically reflects my motivation for working with your team.
This will be sent to you after an initial discussion, based on your specific needs and expectations.
letter.fourth: Please do not hesitate to contact me directly via my LinkedIn for any further information. I look forward to hearing from you.

field.name: Identity <small>(Ex: First name Last name, Company, Association)</small>

form.successMessage:
Your message has been sent.
We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
form.errorMessage:
An error has occurred while sending your message.
Please try again later or contact me directly by email.

404.text:
The page you are looking for has not been found (moved or deleted).
Please check the URL.

redirect.subtitle: To your language
redirect.text:
We'll redirect you to your browser's preferred language, if available,
otherwise, you'll automatically be in English.
